document.full_text: more than a million mothers and newborn babies are dying each year from easily prevented birth complications because of a chronic shortage of midwives across much of the developing world, a new report from save the children said on friday.
document.title: midwife shortage costs over a million lives: report
lines_and_colors: more than a million mothers and newborn babies are dying each year from easily prevented birth complications because of a chronic shortage of midwives across much of the developing world, a new report from save the children said on friday.
